import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import Swal from 'sweetalert2'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { email:string='' password:string='' login(){ //classin ullil no fn required if(!this.email || !this.password ){ alert('plesase fill the form ') }else{ Swal.fire({ title: "Login Sucessfull", icon: "success", showConfirmButton: false, timer: 2000 }); } } }
Login
Invalid Username Invalid Passwrord
